name: Asterix: Total Retaliation
description:
A defense game inspired by the Asterix comic.

The Romans are definitely stubborn. More determined than ever, they are planning once again to get their hands on the famous magic potion. This time, they’ve come with a stupid, evil plan: to invade the Gaul village and fight until one of them manages to grab Getafix’s cauldron.

Hordes of legionaries emerge in succession across the battlefield from the Roman camps surrounding the village: Totorum, Aquarium, Laudanum and Compendium. Fortunately, Asterix, Obelix, Dogmatix and all the village’s inhabitants will be nearby to give you a hand in countering the attacks.

Collect the units of potion you need to place the Gauls and obstacles on the field. Each of them has their own skill. So, devise a good strategy for keeping the druid’s potion in a safe place.... and don’t trust the Romans!

Features:

- Find all the main characters from the Asterix village
- Use Gallic's gods special powers against Romans
- Discover new ways to slap Romans thanks to awesome mini games
- Play in story mode or endless mode
